item.title: Quantization in LLMS (Part 1): LLM.int8(), NF4
item.description: Introduction to Quantization Whether you’re an AI enthusiast looking to run large language models (LLMs) on your personal device, a startup aiming to serve state-of-the-art models efficiently, or a researcher fine-tuning models for specific tasks, quantization is a key technique to understand. Quantization can be broadly categorized into two main approaches: Quantization Aware Training (QAT): This involves training the model with reduced precision, allowing it to adjust during the training process to perform well under quantized conditions.
